info.title: SupaEval
info.description:
SupaEval Backend API - AI Agent and Task Evaluation Platform
    
    ## Features
    
    * **Authentication**: API key-based authentication with workspace isolation
    * **Agent Management**: Create and manage AI agents
    * **Evaluation Runs**: Track and manage evaluation runs
    * **Trace Ingestion**: High-volume trace event ingestion with batch support
    * **Query APIs**: Retrieve runs and events with pagination
    
    ## Authentication
    
    All endpoints (except health check) require authentication using an API key.
    Include your API key in the `Authorization` header as a Bearer token:
    
    ```
    Authorization: Bearer sk_your_api_key_here
    ```

post.description: Login endpoint to get JWT token.
Logout endpoint (stateless JWT, client should discard token).
Refresh token endpoint (stub for future implementation).

schema.title: Response List Api Keys V1 Auth Api Keys Get

post.description:
Admin endpoint to create a user.

This endpoint uses Form parameters to provide a user-friendly interface in Swagger UI.

schema.title: Response List Tenants V1 Tenants  Get

get.description: Get a specific tenant by ID.
List all workspaces for the current tenant.

schema.title: Response List Workspaces V1 Workspaces Get

post.description: Switch active workspace context (returns new token in future).

get.description: List all agents in the current workspace.

schema.title: Response List Agents V1 Agents Get

post.description: Create a new agent in the current workspace.

get.description: Get a specific agent by ID.
List evaluation runs with pagination and filtering.
Get a specific run by ID.

post.description: Ingest a batch of traces and spans.

Ingest a batch of trace events.

This endpoint supports partial failure - some events may succeed while others fail.
The response will indicate the number of successes and failures.

get.description: Get all events for a specific run with pagination.

post.description: Ingest a batch of evaluation results.

get.description: List all datasets for the current workspace.

schema.title: Response List Datasets V1 Datasets Get

post.description:
Create one or more prompts.

Accepts either a single prompt object or a list of prompt objects.

schema.title: Response Create Prompts V1 Prompts Post

get.description: List all prompts for a dataset.

get.description: Get audit logs for the current workspace.

Health check endpoint.

Returns the status of the API and basic information.
